post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Hi,



My name is Richard Goldglass and I am Staffing Consultant with iVedha.  iVedha is a Business Solutions Provider offering strategic Enterprise Solutions & Managed Services to help companies with their Information Technology, Business Processes and Human Capital requirements.



I came across your resume on Monster.com and I have an opportunity that may be of interest to you or someone you know.  In particular I have Sr. Java Developer opportunities that you may be a strong fit for.  These are full time/permanent roles located in Toronto .  More information about these opportunities can be found in the attached files.



Please let me know if this opportunity is of interest to you or someone you know.  Also, if you could please send a copy of your resume in a word document along with your current salary, salary expectations, and availability, it would be greatly appreciated.



I look forward to hearing from you soon.



Richard

---

Richard Goldglass B.A. I.T., Psych.



iVedha

People.Technology.Outsourcing



p:  416.424.6614  x 2007

p:  347.534.1429

c:  416.949.7770

f:   416.385.8165



richard@ivedha.com

www.ivedha.com



1370 Don Mills Rd. Suite 300 || Toronto ||  Ontario || M3B 3N7

244 Fifth Avenue . Suite 2561|| New York || New York || 10001-7604











This e-mail (including attachments, if any) is for the addressed person only. Initial introduction of a candidate Via E-Mail, or Fax, is considered by law to be represented by iVedha Inc. Canada iVedha USA . Our Fee is due and payable when a candidate is referred to within a 12 month period.
post.title: Sr. Java Developer opportunities
